Quick search

Api¶

Authentication¶

Method Resource Description
POST /cloudml/auth/get_auth_url Get oauth redirect url
POST /cloudml/auth/authenticate Authenticate
POST /cloudml/auth/get_user Get current user info

Import Handlers¶

Method Resource Description
GET /cloudml/import/handler/ Get list
GET /cloudml/import/handler/:HandlerName Get by name
POST /cloudml/import/handler/:HandlerName Create

Models¶

Method Resource Description
GET /cloudml/model/ Get list of models
GET /cloudml/model/:ModelName Get model by name
POST /cloudml/model/:ModelName/:HandlerName/predict Predict
